details:
The Xen Project reports:

> The handler for XEN\_DOMCTL\_gettscinfo failed to initialize a
> padding field subsequently copied to guest memory.
>
> A similar leak existed in XEN\_SYSCTL\_getdomaininfolist, which is
> being addressed here regardless of that operation being declared
> unsafe for disaggregation by XSA-77.
>
> Malicious or buggy stub domain kernels or tool stacks otherwise
> living outside of Domain0 may be able to read sensitive data
> relating to the hypervisor or other guests not under the control of
> that domain.
